name: Espresso Old Fashioned
preparation:
Serious whiskey drinkers know that a complex and flavorful Old Fashioned starts with rye. What’s more surprising is how well the light floral and citrus notes of Redemption Rye are complemented by a bitter espresso flavor. Experience it for yourself with the Espresso Old Fashioned.

Rinse an Old Fashioned glass with the absinthe and set aside.

Add remaining ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir.

Strain into the prepared glass over ice.

Express the oil from a lemon twist and drop in as a garnish.
